title: Move To Block
description: Makes the entity move towards specified blocks

tick_interval.title: Tick Interval
tick_interval.description: The amount ticks between each search

start_chance.title: Start Chance
start_chance.description: The chance that the entity starts on this block search

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: The range of blocks to search

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: How heigh the search can be, (or low)

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: The radius when the entity must be within of the block to be considered 'there'

stay_duration.title: Stay Duration
stay_duration.description: The amount of time the entity stays near the block

on_stay_completed.title: On Stay Completed
on_stay_completed.description: The events to call whenever this entity has completed it staying duration

on_reach.title: On Reach
on_reach.description: The events to call whenever this entity has reached it goal, but is possibly still staying here
